testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to update the existing address information of a customer with the specified address ID number and belonging customer_id via the API connection.
testcase.name: The update of the address record should be confirmed through the API.
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/profile/addressDetails" path parameters............passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the 271 information to send to the api register endpoint.passed * The api user sends the "getbody" request and saves the "Response".........passed * The api user verifies the content of the data 271 in the response body at the "list" endpoint.passed
